name: Monotonia (BrenoMancini, Galiontth, Limah1, Ray)
description:
1 Button game take on Gamification on Fordism work model.
7 days project on Unreal Engine for the  One Button Game Jam!

It will be updated!
Iit is in development and soon will have a full release.

Directed by: Breno Mancini and Gabriel Lima
Audio design and music by: Gabriel Penha (Galiontth)
2D art and general artist: Ray Torres ( Pacokits )
 
WIP!
